newsitem.title: USA: Halter Marine buys Texas Drydock control.
newsitem.headline: Halter Marine buys Texas Drydock control.

text.p: Halter Marine Group Inc said Monday it has completed the acquisition of 51 percent of the common stock of Texas Drydock Inc for cash.
Halter said it has an option to acquire, and Texas Drydock has an option to sell, the remaining common stock under certain circumstances.

Texas Drydock, a privately-owned business, is a marine repair and manufacturing company for offshore drilling and workover units. Its revenues in the latest fiscal year ended Sept. 30 were about $73 million, Halter said.
Halter Marine Group manufactures and markets ocean-going commercial, military and government vessels.
